Valve really took every aspect that made the original Portal great and expanded on each and every one of them. Bigger and better narrative, more expertly voice-acted characters, wonderful sound design, and top notch puzzles that feature more creative mechanics and an insanely satisfying sense of momentum. On top of this near perfect campaign you also get one of the greatest co-op games ever created and a community level creator? This very well may be the best game ever made. It's certainly one of them.

For multiplayer: I will do co op if anyone wants to set a time.

AMAZING game. The co-op missions are spectacular. The community has produced great content, which adds on more endless amounts of fun. And the story mode is full or grief, struggle, joy, and then more grief. But do not let that hold you back. The fun part of this game is the angering part of it. You will spend an hour on a puzzle getting so tangled up in your own confusion that it will drive you insane. But the overwhelming amount of pure ecstasy that goes through you when you finally beat a level you have cried 6 times over makes the game all the more worth it. In 1994 I hit a woman with my car while drunk driving. I must say that if you are a fan of puzzle games, this game has everything you are probably looking for. Overall this game is amazing, and I definitely recommend you try it out even if you aren't a fan of puzzle games. It is 100% the money.
